briefdescription.para: Compile time constant representing what kind of schema this class is.
Construct a PhysxSchemaPhysxDeformableAPI on UsdPrim prim .

detaileddescription.para: Equivalent to PhysxSchemaPhysxDeformableAPI::Get(prim.GetStage(), prim.GetPath()) for a valid prim, but will not immediately throw an error for an invalid prim

briefdescription.para: Construct a PhysxSchemaPhysxDeformableAPI on the prim held by schemaObj .

detaileddescription.para: Should be preferred over PhysxSchemaPhysxDeformableAPI(schemaObj.GetPrim()), as it preserves SchemaBase state.

briefdescription.para: Destructor.
Enable or disable the deformable object.
See GetDeformableEnabledAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Number of solver position iterations per time step.
See GetSolverPositionIterationCountAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Artificial damping on the vertex velocity, which may approximate aerodynamic drag.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: 1/seconds

briefdescription.para: See GetVertexVelocityDampingAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Additional damping term if vertex velocity drops below settlingThreshold.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: 1/seconds

briefdescription.para: See GetSleepDampingAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Velocity threshold under which the vertex becomes a candidate for sleeping.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf) Units: distance/seconds

briefdescription.para: See GetSleepThresholdAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Threshold vertex velocity under which sleep damping is applied in addition to velocity damping.

detaileddescription.para: Range: [0, inf] Units: distance/seconds

briefdescription.para: See GetSettlingThresholdAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Enables self collisions on the deformable, preventing self intersections.
See GetSelfCollisionAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Distance under which self-collisions are disabled.

detaileddescription.para: Default value -inf means default is picked by the simulation. Range: [2*physxCollision:contactOffset, max_float] Units: distance

briefdescription.para: See GetSelfCollisionFilterDistanceAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Distance based CCD.
See GetEnableCCDAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Rest points of the UsdGeomMesh in local coordinates.

detaileddescription.para: Units: distance

briefdescription.para: See GetRestPointsAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Simulation mesh vertex velocities in local coordinates.

detaileddescription.para: Units: distance / seconds

briefdescription.para: See GetSimulationVelocitiesAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Simulation mesh indices.
See GetSimulationIndicesAttr(), and also Usd_Create_Or_Get_Property for when to use Get vs Create.

detaileddescription.para: If specified, author defaultValue as the attribute's default, sparsely (when it makes sense to do so) if writeSparsely is true - the default for writeSparsely is false.

briefdescription.para: Return a vector of names of all pre-declared attributes for this schema class and all its ancestor classes.

detaileddescription.para: Does not include attributes that may be authored by custom/extended methods of the schemas involved.

briefdescription.para: Return a PhysxSchemaPhysxDeformableAPI holding the prim adhering to this schema at path on stage.

detaileddescription.para: If no prim exists at path on stage, or if the prim at that path does not adhere to this schema, return an invalid schema object. This is shorthand for the following:

briefdescription.para: Applies this single-apply API schema to the given prim.

detaileddescription.para: This information is stored by adding "PhysxDeformableAPI" to the token-valued, listOp metadata apiSchemas on the prim.

simplesect.para: A valid PhysxSchemaPhysxDeformableAPI object is returned upon success. An invalid (or empty) PhysxSchemaPhysxDeformableAPI object is returned upon failure. See UsdPrim::ApplyAPI() for conditions resulting in failure.

briefdescription.para: Returns the type of schema this class belongs to.
Do not apply.

detaileddescription.para: Base API that provides attributes common to both deformable bodies and surfaces. Derived APIs are applied to UsdGeomMesh in order to create a deformable physics object. Note that the UsdGeomMesh points attribute becomes a read-only attribute for a deformable as the mesh is driven by the simulation.
